title: Windows 11 KB5077181 Security Update Causing Some Devices to Restart in an Infinite Loop
desc: Microsoft's February 10, 2026, security update KB5077181 for Windows 11 versions 24H2 (build 26200.7840) and 25H2 (build 26100.7840) has triggered widespread reports of critical boot failures just days after deployment.
